charts.name: Write on topic (rate)

sources.name: A
sources.query: sum(align(1m, sum , mavg(4m, ts(confluentcloud.confluent.kafka.server.received.bytes, job=${ccloud_job} and kafka.id=${ccloud_cluster} and topic=${ccloud_topic}))))

charts.description: Per-second average rate of ingress of data to topics, basic cluster has a max of 100MBps.

charts.name: Read on topic (rate)

sources.name: A
sources.query: sum(align(1m, sum , mavg(4m, ts(confluentcloud.confluent.kafka.server.sent.bytes, job=${ccloud_job} and kafka.id=${ccloud_cluster} and topic=${ccloud_topic}))))

charts.description: Per-second average rate of egress data to topics, basic cluster has a max of 100MBps.

charts.name: Requests (rate)

sources.name: A
sources.query: sum(align(1m, sum, mavg(4m, ts(confluentcloud.confluent.kafka.server.request.count , job=${ccloud_job} and kafka.id=${ccloud_cluster} and principal.id=${ccloud_principal}))))

charts.description: Per-second average rate of requests, basic cluster maxes out at 1500 requests per second.

charts.name: Write/Read Records %

sources.name: A
sources.query: sum(mavg(4m, ts(confluentcloud.confluent.kafka.server.received.records, job=${ccloud_job} and kafka.id=${ccloud_cluster} and topic=${ccloud_topic})))

sources.name: B
sources.query: sum(mavg(4m, ts(confluentcloud.confluent.kafka.server.sent.records, job=${ccloud_job} and kafka.id=${ccloud_cluster} and topic=${ccloud_topic})))

charts.description: The percentage of records being written vs messages being read from the cluster.

charts.name: Retained bytes
charts.description: Basic clusters have a max retained bytes limit of 5 TB prior to replication. confluent_kafka_server_retained_bytes is after replication thus needs to be divided by 3.

charts.name: New Chart
charts.description: The sum of partitions in a cluster. Basic cluster max partitions limit is 2048.

charts.name: Active connections
charts.description: The number of active connections to a cluster. Basic clusters limit active connections to 1000.

charts.name: Bytes Retained by Topic

sources.name: A
sources.query: sum(ts(confluentcloud.confluent.kafka.server.retained.bytes, kafka.id="${ccloud_cluster}" and job=${ccloud_job} and topic=${ccloud_topic}), topic, kafka.id)

charts.description: The current count of bytes retained by the cluster, summed across all partitions. The count is sampled every 60 seconds.

charts.name: Bytes Received by Topic

sources.name: A
sources.query: sum(ts(confluentcloud.confluent.kafka.server.received.bytes, kafka.id="${ccloud_cluster}" and job=${ccloud_job} and topic=${ccloud_topic}), topic)

charts.description: The delta count of bytes received from the network. Each sample is the number of bytes received since the previous data sample. The count is sampled every 60 seconds.

charts.name: Bytes Sent by Topic

sources.name: A
sources.query: sum(ts(confluentcloud.confluent.kafka.server.sent.bytes, kafka.id="${ccloud_cluster}" and job=${ccloud_job} and topic=${ccloud_topic}), topic, kafka.id)

charts.description: The delta count of bytes sent over the network. Each sample is the number of bytes sent since the previous data point. The count is sampled every 60 seconds.

charts.name: Request Rate per minute
charts.description: The delta count of requests received over the network. Each sample is the number of requests received since the previous data point. The count sampled every 60 seconds.

sources.name: A
sources.query: sum(ts(confluentcloud.confluent.kafka.server.received.records, kafka.id="${ccloud_cluster}" and job=${ccloud_job} and topic=${ccloud_topic}), topic, kafka.id)

sources.name: A
sources.query: sum(ts(confluentcloud.confluent.kafka.server.sent.records, kafka.id="${ccloud_cluster}" and job=${ccloud_job} and topic=${ccloud_topic}), topic, kafka.id)

charts.name: Schema count
charts.description: The delta count of requests received over the network. Each sample is the number of requests received since the previous data point. The count sampled every 60 seconds.
